title: Bobby’s Mailbag Guy Sends Text to Ex Before Wedding + Old Town Road Parody Drama Escalates + Fast Food Fantasy Draft
itunes:title: Bobby’s Mailbag Guy Sends Text to Ex Before Wedding + Old Town Road Parody Drama Escalates + Fast Food Fantasy Draft
description:
Bobby reads an email he got about a guy who sent a text to his ex-girlfriend before getting married and takes calls on if it’s weird. Also a new development in the Old Town Road parody drama with Lil Nas X and we do the Fast Food Fantasy Draft. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
